Table 68. Personal crimes of violence, 2005: Percent of victimizations in which victims took self-protective measures, by type of crime and victim-offender relationship
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Includes verbal threats of rape and threats of sexual assault.
